Learning-outcomes.item: Student should know chemical building blocks in life.
Student should be able to identify cellular structures and connect structures with their roles on living systems.
Students should be able to connect energy production with energy uses.
Student should be able to connect cell division with growth and reproduction.
Students should be able to analysis genetic relatedness based on pattern of inheritance.
Students should be able to connect the role of DNA in inheritance with phenotype.
Students should be able to value how evolution provides a framework to study organisms.
